entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
